law.catch_line: If the local government approves the request for a joint hearing with respect to a State unit, that ...

text.section:
If the local government approves the request for a joint hearing with respect to a State unit, that State unit has 10 days after receipt of the notice from the Coordinator to:
decide whether to participate in a joint hearing; and
give notice of its decision to:
the applicant;
the local government; and
the Coordinator.
The Coordinator shall give any other State unit involved in the hearing notice of a decision made by a State unit under subsection (a) of this section.

If there is only 1 State unit affected and the local government elects to have a joint hearing, the State unit shall participate in the joint hearing, unless it is entitled to an extension as provided in § 11-521 of this subtitle.
